AT.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
AT.description: Ein mysteriöser Sturm reißt deine Familie aus dem Meer, und nun liegt es an dir, das Geheimnis hinter dem Unglück aufzulösen. Die Suche führt dich durch weitläufige Unterwasserreiche voller Schönheit, Abenteuer und Gefahr. Mit Schallwellen findest du versteckte Höhlen und kannst die rätselhaften Glyphen entschlüsseln. Doch pass auf Haie auf, die den Ozean auf Beutezug durchstreifen! Bald wirst du entdecken, dass es um mehr als die Sicherheit deiner Familie geht. Das Schicksal der ganzen Welt liegt in deinen Flossen. Zusätzlich zur neuen Aufmachung in 3D bietet 3D Ecco the Dolphin den Super-Delfin-Modus, bei dem Gesundheit und Atem unerschöpflich sind!

AU.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
AU.description: After a mysterious storm sweeps your family from the sea, it’s up to you to find them and uncover the mystery behind the forces that took them. The search to find them will take you through vast underwater realms of treachery, beauty and adventure. Use your sonar to discover hidden caverns and unlock the secrets of crystal glyphs, but beware of packs of bloodthirsty sharks that search the ocean for unwitting prey! In your quest, you’ll discover that more than your family’s safety is at stake. The fate of the whole world rests on your wits and fins. In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Ecco the Dolphin also features Super Dolphin Mode where your health and breath never deplete!

BG.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
BG.description: After a mysterious storm sweeps your family from the sea, it’s up to you to find them and uncover the mystery behind the forces that took them. The search to find them will take you through vast underwater realms of treachery, beauty and adventure. Use your sonar to discover hidden caverns and unlock the secrets of crystal glyphs, but beware of packs of bloodthirsty sharks that search the ocean for unwitting prey! In your quest, you’ll discover that more than your family’s safety is at stake. The fate of the whole world rests on your wits and fins. In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Ecco the Dolphin also features Super Dolphin Mode where your health and breath never deplete!

BE.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
BE.description: Tes proches ont été balayés en mer par un mystérieux orage : tu dois les retrouver et lever le voile sur les mystérieuses forces qui les ont enlevés. Pars à leur recherche à travers un vaste royaume sous-marin regorgeant de pièges, de beauté et d'aventure. Utilise ton sonar pour découvrir des grottes cachées et révéler les secrets des glyphes de crystal. Mais attention aux requins assoiffés de sang ! Dans ta quête, tu découvriras qu'il ne s'agit pas que de la survie de ta famille. Le sort du monde entier est entre tes nageoires. En plus de sa toute nouvelle présentation en relief, 3D Ecco the Dolphin comporte un mode Super Dolphin dans lequel ta santé et ta respiration sont illimitées !

ES.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
ES.description: Después de que una misteriosa tormenta se llevara a tu familia, deberás encontrarla y descubrir el misterio sobre las fuerzas que se la llevaron. En tu búsqueda, viajarás por inmensos reinos submarinos, llenos de maldad, belleza y aventuras. Usa tu ecolocación para encontrar cavernas ocultas y descubrir los secretos de los glifos de cristal ¡Pero ten cuidado con los bancos de tiburones sedientos de sangre que andan a la caza de una presa desprevenida! En tu misión, descubrirás que no solo está en juego la seguridad de tu familia, sino que el destino de todo el mundo dependerá de tu astucia. ¡Además de los nuevos gráficos en 3D, 3D Ecco the Dolphin también cuenta con el modo Superdelfín con el que nunca te quedarás sin salud ni oxígeno!

IT.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
IT.description: Un'oscura tempesta ha risucchiato i tuoi amici dal mare! Devi trovarli e scoprire cosa si cela dietro questa misteriosa forza. Esplorerai regni acquatici pieni di inganni, avventure e meraviglie. Usa il sonar per scoprire caverne nascoste e sblocca i segreti dei cristalli, ma fai attenzione agli squali assetati di sangue che perlustrano l'oceano alla ricerca di prede! Presto scoprirai che non sono solo i tuoi amici ad essere in pericolo. Il destino del mondo intero è nelle tue pinne. Oltre ad essere completamente in 3D, 3D Ecco the Dolphin include la modalità Super delfino, con cui avrai energia e fiato illimitati!

NL.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
NL.description: Nadat een mysterieuze storm je familie uit de zee heeft weggerukt, moet jij ze vinden en uitzoeken wat het geheim is achter de krachten die ze hebben ontvoerd. Je zoektocht leidt je door enorme onderwaterrijken vol verraad, schoonheid en avontuur. Gebruik je sonar om verborgen grotten te vinden en de geheimen achter kristallen hiërogliefen te ontrafelen, maar kijk uit voor de scholen bloeddorstige haaien die overal in de oceaan op zoek zijn naar prooien! Tijdens je avontuur ontdek je dat er meer op het spel staat dan alleen de veiligheid van je familie. Het lot van de hele wereld ligt in jouw handen en vinnen. 3D Ecco the Dolphin kent niet alleen volledig nieuwe 3D-beelden, maar bevat ook een Super Dolphin-stand waarin je gezondheid en adem nooit opraken!

NZ.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
NZ.description: After a mysterious storm sweeps your family from the sea, it’s up to you to find them and uncover the mystery behind the forces that took them. The search to find them will take you through vast underwater realms of treachery, beauty and adventure. PL.description: After a mysterious storm sweeps your family from the sea, it’s up to you to find them and uncover the mystery behind the forces that took them. Use your sonar to discover hidden caverns and unlock the secrets of crystal glyphs, but beware of packs of bloodthirsty sharks that search the ocean for unwitting prey! In your quest, you’ll discover that more than your family’s safety is at stake. The fate of the whole world rests on your wits and fins. In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Ecco the Dolphin also features Super Dolphin Mode where your health and breath never deplete!

PT.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
PT.description: Depois de uma tempestade misteriosa fazer desaparecer a tua família do mar, a tua missão é encontrá-la e descobrir o mistério que se esconde por trás das forças responsáveis por este desaparecimento. A tua busca vai levar-te através de vastos reinos subaquáticos repletos de traição, beleza e aventura. Usa o teu sonar para descobrir cavernas escondidas e desbloquear os segredos dos glifos de cristal, mas cuidado com os tubarões sedentos de sangue que vagueiam pelo oceano à procura de presas fáceis! Na tua demanda irás descobrir que há mais em jogo que a segurança da tua família. O destino do mundo está nas tuas barbatanas! Para além da nova apresentação em 3D, o Ecco the Dolphin 3D também inclui o Super Dolphin Mode (Modo Super Golfinho) onde a tua energia e oxigénio nunca se gastam!

RU.name: 3D Ecco The Dolphin
RU.description: Таинственная буря унесла всю вашу семью, и теперь только вы сможете отыскать ее, и заодно раскрыть тайну, стоящую за мистической силой, похитившей ваших родственников. Во время поисков вам предстоит много путешествовать по обширному подводному миру, в котором вас ждет немало приключений. Вы узнаете, что такое настоящая красота и встретитесь с коварным предательством. Используйте звуковые волны, чтобы найти потайные пещеры и раскрыть секрет хрустальных символов, но и не забывайте про кровожадных акул, которые стаями бороздят океанские просторы в поисках очередной зазевавшейся жертвы. Занимаясь поисками семьи, вы узнаете, что от вас теперь зависит еще и судьба целого мира. Проявите смекалку и спасите его! 3D-версия Ecco the Dolphin получила не только полностью трехмерный вид, но и режим супер-дельфина, в котором ваши силы и запас воздуха никогда не иссякают!
